title: "Retrieving Real-World Email Addresses From Pretrained Natural Language Models"
excerpt: "New research from the US indicates that pretrained language models (PLMs) such as GPT-3 can be successfully queried for real-world email addresses that were included in the vast swathes of data used to train them."
